name: Defy.
description: We built a framework for an interactive narrative game, and used it to create this prototype for ResistJam 2017. You play as a citizen of a region ruled by an oppressive Regime. Your goal is to defy the Regime, strengthening the Resistance, all while just trying to stay alive. You are presented with a series of events and choices, with many outcomes and effects. This is a rough prototype, but was our effort to shed light on the truly terrible realities many people around the world living under oppression face as their every day truth.
